diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Alcohol use/withdrawal, Diabetic ketoacidosis, Diabetes mellitus type I with complications, Polysubstance abuse
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with hyperglycemia (1008) and elevated lipase levels (1373), alongside acute abdominal pain and symptoms suggestive of pancreatitis. Imaging studies did not show any other significant abnormalities, supporting the diagnosis of acute pancreatitis.
